name: Simple read me file for the Ubertor Active Listings widget.
author: SplitMango Media Inc.

sections.description:
2) Login to your WordPress dashboard and activate the plugin

3) Goto the widgets section in your dashboard and draft the new widget to your sidebar

4) Give the widget a title ie: Active Listing and type in your Ubertor website address ie: http://www.mywebsite.com

short_description: 2) Login to your Wordpress dashboard and activate the plugin 3) Goto the widgets section in your dashboard and draft the new widget to your sidebar …
description:
2) Login to your WordPress dashboard and activate the plugin

3) Goto the widgets section in your dashboard and draft the new widget to your sidebar

4) Give the widget a title ie: Active Listing and type in your Ubertor website address ie: http://www.mywebsite.com
